title: Elephants: Giant Mammals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,479 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1100L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and R
description: In Elephants: Giant Mammals, students will learn all about the largest land animal on Earth. They will read about where and how elephants live and how they raise their young as well as the differences between African and Asian elephants. Maps and photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
